pack

Class ChatPanelGUI.TextStyleEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • pack.ChatPanelGUI.TextStyleEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    ChatPanelGUI

    private class ChatPanelGUI.TextStyleEventHandler
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    ActionListener that handles the style formatting of the chat. Converts text to and from the XML-representation of the Message instance to the HTML representation of the GUI-display. Listens to the Style and Formatting buttons of the current GUI.

      • checkAndInsertTag

        private void checkAndInsertTag(String tag,
                               HTMLParser p)
        Utility method for checking a HTML-representation and inserting the appropiate tags for whichever style was selected for the highlighted text.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to be inserted
        p - The HTMLParser instance that parsed the chat display.

      • preceededTagIndices

        private int preceededTagIndices(String plain,
                                String html,
                                int endIndex)
        Calculates the number of tag-characters that differ between the two html-strings
        Parameters:
        plain - - The plain non-formatted text representation
        html - - The HTML representation of the text
        endIndex - - The index to end at
        Returns:
        The number of characters differing the plain and html represenation up to endIndex in the plain text
